motd.title: Message of the Day
motd.body:
Release Summary 2.8.0: - Added the ability to export collected ping results as CSV and will also be added to the ZIP archive - Removed the very first version of this tool, which was written in batch, as it was still roaming around in this repository
Release Summary 2.7.0: - Fixed a crash when trying to change the installation directory under certain conditions - Fixed a few issues related to the debug launcher when gathering information where it closes too soon or has no administrative permissions - Added a new item under "Open" to quickly start a debug launcher
